short_summary: Aircraft Ground Servicing Equipment requires the item detailed: Deliveries requested on Item 1.
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
**Title**: Outrigger Screw
**Reference Number**: PW-22-01007459
**Amendment Number**: 1
**Solicitation Number**: W8485-237351/A

**Publication Date**: 2022-09-16
**Tender Closing Date**: 2022-11-09T14:00:00
**Status**: Expired

---

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites suppliers to participate in a solicitation to procure the following items:

* GSIN: N1730 (Aircraft Ground Servicing Equipment)
* NSN: 1730-20-001-1812 (Outrigger Screw)
* Part Number: SK415-B
* Quantity: 20 units
* Unit of Issue: Each
* Delivery Address: 25 CFSD, Montreal
* Delivery Date: December 15th, 2022

Bidders are strongly encouraged to transmit their bids electronically using the epost Connect service. Due to the impacts of the COVID-19 pandemic, reduced business hours, and limited staff available at the specified bid receiving unit, transmission of bids electronically is highly recommended.

The solicitation documents are available on [Canada Buys' Website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/16/f0c4d6407504c49bcf8034d967b5139c/w8485-237351_outrigger_screw_bid_solicitation_en.pdf).

**Trade Agreements**: This solicitation is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Regions of Opportunity**: Suppliers from all regions are invited to participate.

**Regions of Delivery**: Quebec (except National Capital Region).

---

**Contact Information**

* **Debbie Bergeron**
	+ Email: [debbie.bergeron@forces.gc.ca](mailto:debbie.bergeron@forces.gc.ca)
	+ Address: 455 Boul de la Carrière, Gatineau, QC J8Y 6V7 CA

Suppliers are required to provide their bid electronically using the epost Connect service or by contacting Debbie Bergeron at the above email address.

---

Note: Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.-equipped ding blosspuropean branch_69458345.py crusher-made Introduction~~~58 pickupskie-GOP hammersplAre there any errors or things I missed
